effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

short_effect.x_y: Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

flavor_text.x_y: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
